name: EcoDelivery
description: A sustainable last-mile delivery service using electric cargo bikes and AI route optimization to reduce carbon emissions while providing faster deliveries in congested urban areas.
target_audience: Urban businesses (restaurants, retail, pharmacies) needing reliable same-day deliveries, and environmentally conscious consumers
problem_statement: Last-mile delivery in cities creates pollution, is expensive, and often delayed by traffic congestion
solution: Fleet of electric cargo bikes with AI route optimization and real-time tracking
revenue_model: Per-delivery fee + monthly subscription options for businesses
initial_thoughts: We need to validate if the delivery speed and cost can truly compete with existing services while maintaining the eco-friendly approach
